verbs.description: ig probes complaints of [ARG0: state technology office] [ARGM-MNR: wasteful] [V: spending] state inspector general catherine leahy scott has for several months been investigating operations at the state office of technology services after receiving emailed complaints about a lengthy list of alleged spending abuses and waste in the agency which is supposed to oversee the data systems for a variety of state functions albany office of information technology services software companies bob samson maggie miller andrew cuomo buffalo new york motor vehicles help desk ig
